sos:
If you need help with the bot, just join the help desk: @zaphodiasgroup.
We will try to help you as soon as possible.
unignore_user_success:
Done!
You are now receiving updates from this user.
feedback_success:
Message succesfully sent.
If needed, you will be contacted soon, here on Telegram.
Thank you!
alert_main:
Howdy!
I have a message for you.

:bust_in_silhouette: *User*: %s
:busts_in_silhouette: *Group:* %s
:envelope: *Text*:
alert_link:
%s <- Click here to view this message in its context.

/ignore\_%s <- Click here to ignore notifications by this user.
setlang_start:
You can use your preferred language.
Just send me the corresponding command:
setlang_success: Language updated succesfully and set to *English*.
donate:
You can use me for free.

Sadly, even if I am a bot I need to pay bills in _BOTLand_.
If you would like to give some help, just click here: http://paypal.me/pitasi.
Thanks!
warning_group: *Warning:* this command works only in private chat!
sourcecode:
My source code is *open* and *free*.
You can find it here: http://www.github.com/pitasi/TagAlertBot.

Subscribe to @zaphodiaschan to be updated in case of changes.
help_group:
Hi there!
I'm TagAlertBot, and I'm here to help you!

Contact me in private to discover what can I do for you.
@TagAlertBot
help:
Hi!
With me, you won't lose important messages inside groups. When someone tags you using your @username, I will send you a private message.

Please note that I must be inside the group to work.

Follow @zaphodiaschan to get updated with last news and join @zaphodiasgroup if you need help.
findmsg_private:
Done!
Now check the group of the message.
ignore_user_fail: You are already ignoring this user.
unignore_user_fail: You are not ignoring this user.
start_error:
Unexpected error occurred.
Please /feedback reporting this.
feedback_start:
Hey! If you find a bug, have some awesome ideas, or just want to share your experience with the bot, you can contact me in seconds.
Just write your message now (or /cancel to abort):
enable_success:
Alerts successfully enabled.
If you change your @username just write a message to the bot to be sure it is updated!

Feel free to leave a /feedback sharing your experience later.
warning_no_username:
I'm sorry.
You need to to set an username from Telegram's settings before using this command.
disable_success:
Alerts succesfully disabled.
Take a second to give me a /feedback of your experience with the bot.
Remind that you can _re-enable_ notifications anytime by clicking here:
findmsg_error:
I'm sorry.
Error(s) occurred searching the message.

If you think this is a mistake /feedback me.
ignore_user_success:
Done!
You are now ignoring this user.
ignore_group_success:
Done!
You are now ignoring this group.
ignore_group_fail: You are already ignoring this group.
unignore_group_success:
Done!
You are now receiving updates from this group.
unignore_group_fail: You are not ignoring this user.
retrieve_fail:
I'm sorry.
You already retrieved this message too many times.
undo_btn: Click here to undo this operation.
